website_summaries.verdict: Good design with plenty of perks makes this an excellent changing station.
pros: Two storage pockets for protective sheets and baby wipes
Includes two hooks for hanging diaper bags, which can hold 25 pounds each
cons: Does not come with mounting hardware

website_summaries.verdict: If you want a functional changing table that will be simple, safe, and easy to use, this is by far your best bet.
pros: A solidly made changing table that is unmatched in terms of the convenience and ease of use that it offers
Easy to install and its design makes cleanup incredibly simple and quick
cons: Not quite as aesthetically pleasing as some of the other models, but it's practicality is unsurpassed

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and put together well. Check the photos for which hardware to use to install
customer_reviews.text: Installed this changing table in the bathroom of my business and I’m very pleased in my purchase. It’s easy enough for a non-professional to set up; just get a pack of 6 snap toggle anchors, and a pack of washers. Check the photos for the packages of hardware that I purchased from Home Depot.
customer_reviews.author: Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install just needed to purchase pack of 3/16 snap toggle bolts and (6) 1 1/4" fisher washers.
customer_reviews.author: Claude

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for home use
customer_reviews.text: My wife has a home daycare and this was a great choice. It is easy to install (for those with the correct knowledge and experience) and seems durable for home use. If you're wondering how it could be so much cheaper than the other units on Amazon, the answer is durability. As I said, its good, but its not the overbuilt toughness of changing tables found in public restrooms. It would not hold up well to excessive abuse and use by those who mistreat everything thats not theirs. Great product, I would recommend it for home, maybe a small church or other place where people would likely take care of things.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan O

customer_reviews.title: looks great and most of all works great
customer_reviews.text: looks great and most of all works great. Not sure why people are upset that it doesn't include hardware. It clearly states why bolts are not included. I spent about $2 at ace on exactly what I needed for my instal.
customer_reviews.author: Jen M.

customer_reviews.title: No hardware?
customer_reviews.text: Yes, I now see in the description that hardware is not included, but who wouldn't include a few fasteners to make this a one stop shop? Now I have to go to the store to buy $5 worth of screws. Edit. Just installed using the recommended fasteners from home depot. These fasteners are garbage. Took me 3 trips to the store because the plastic holding the backer failed. Extremely frustrating and annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: good product, good company
customer_reviews.text: I'm leaving a review for this 3 years after I bought ours. We got it for our business and it's been great but when we switched locations, we discovered the piston thing which keeps it closed was broken. I contacted the company for replacement parts and they shipped me a brand new one! Customer service like this makes this purchase an excellent one.
customer_reviews.author: MinnieMouse

customer_reviews.title: DANGEROUS!! DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: DANGEROUS!! Used in our home daycare for a few months. The center metal U bracket that holds the piston snapped in half. Luckily my wife caught our daughter who had just finished being changed. The fold down surface where you change the child collapsed and hit the wall. A child could have fallen right to the floor. DO NOT BUY THIS.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: very strong item
customer_reviews.text: very strong changing table. it was super easy to install and looks fairly good in the wall. i used it for a church and it has been of great help and usage for the brother that needed.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Meza

customer_reviews.title: No customer support
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this unit for my restaurant. Vital pieces were missing. I’ve attempted to call company only to hold for a very long time then be rerouted to a voicemail. I left VM and have had no response. Still need missing parts. Completely unusable without. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amy K. Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: A little difficult to install at my location since wall was not smooth. My wall had cedar siding with wood strips that kept this from fitting flat. Unless you are handy with tools, pay for installation. Not offered by manufacturer so you have to buy installation from Amazon when you purchase this. The table is very sturdy. Very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: JimK

customer_reviews.title: Be prepared to purchase hardware..
customer_reviews.text: Would have been a five star but the kit comes with zero hardware. It does come with an admonition to have it professionally installed? Probably driven by some fear (or experience) of litigation. Thankfully, there were videos available on line, and the job took 20 minutes after securing the appropriate mounting hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Wubya Echh

customer_reviews.title: Great Changing Table
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. It is supported by a steel plate you fix to the wall with 2 screws into wall studs. After hanging the table on the plate you secure it from moving with 6 additional screws. I installed this in a laundromat bathroom. It holds up to strong downward force. All the strength you need so you don't worry about a baby's safety. I would have given it 5 stars for Easy to Install, however, you need to purchase your own lag bolts and washers.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly J

customer_reviews.title: Looks professional!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Wish I would have had one years ago!! Took my husband 35 minutes to install! You just need 6 lag bolts, a drill, level stud finder and socket set! Super easy!! Nice and slim and very easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: roderick m stora

customer_reviews.title: No hardware included!!! No screws, no info on what type or size either.
customer_reviews.text: No hardware included to mount and doesn't give information on size of screws so I had to search reviews to see if I could find size and hardware needed. I screen shot the pic below from another review. It has the hardware needed to mount picture. I didn't receive my 500 free liners either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NO hardware included and very limited English directions for installation
customer_reviews.text: This is the MOST difficult item I have ever purchased to install... there is simply no way to hold onto the item while just moving it from 1 place to another let alone while trying to install
customer_reviews.author: craigcysco1

customer_reviews.title: Only held up about 6 months. This was used ...
customer_reviews.text: Only held up about 6 months. This was used in an in home day care with about 2-4kids using this 5 days a week. The snaps broke and retracting spring broken
customer_reviews.author: Angie Minew

customer_reviews.title: it is good quality. We have it in our office bathroom ...
customer_reviews.text: it is good quality. We have it in our office bathroom for our clients. It was worth the money and the peace of mind that the baby will be safe and its easy to clean up after. Folds up and out of the way as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jody Dyer

customer_reviews.title: easy to install and durable
customer_reviews.text: easy to install and durable. does not come with screws so you have to source them yourself. They will not be liable, therefore no screws are given

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Overall they are good. I found one that had the bracket for the shock broken off. I’m not sure how that happened.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, heavy duty and has some nice slots to store wipes/diapers and such should you choose. Seems like a very good value given the prices I have seen on similarlybuilt units.

customer_reviews.title: EXTREMELY difficult to install properly!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product DID NOT come with mounting hardware. The description said that it did not have hardware. The mounting instructions were VERY SPARSE. This product should be professionally installed. I am extremely experienced in DIY, but this product kicked my butt. I HIGHLY recommend looking at other products.
customer_reviews.author: Myron Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great product and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and a good commercial style changing table. You will need anchors and screws/bolts, so plan accordingly based on the surface to which this will be mounted. Uses a total of 6 screws on the table itself, plus 2 on the mounting bracket. Very good design.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product

customer_reviews.title: The ECR4Kids Horizontal Commercial Baby Changing is an easy product to install

It is very sturdy and worth the economical price. My only gripe is that it did not come with a mounting plate and/or screws to mount the ECR4Kids Horizontal Commercial Baby Changing. I had to run across the street to Home Depot. I would still recommend this product.

product_meta.title: ECR4Kids ELR-18004 Wall-Mounted Baby Changing Station, Horizontal Fold-Down Diaper Change Table with Safety Straps for Commercial Bathrooms, ADA and ANSI Compliant, Free Replacement Straps, White Granite
product_meta.description: Style:Changing StationRestaurants, businesses, and other locations with public or private restrooms will appreciate the durability, safety, and style infused into this ADA-, ANSI-, and ASTM-compliant baby changing station. The ECR4Kids Wall-Mounted Baby Changing Station is a horizontal fold-down diaper changing table with built-in safety straps, designed for use with infants and toddlers in restrooms at businesses, restaurants, shops, and institutional facilities. It has a smooth and comfortable concave changing surface featuring an adjustable nylon child safety strap with slide release to keep kids safely in place. This ECR4Kids diaper changing table was developed with a space-saving design. It features a bacteria-resistant, high-density polyethylene plastic for strength and durability in an attractive neutral-white color. Our diaper changing board has handy features, including 2 diaper bag/purse hooks that hold up to 25 lbs. each and 2 built-in sanitary paper liners (sold separately). A concealed pneumatic cylinder ensures slow, safe, controlled opening and closing. It is ADA, ANSI, and ASTM compliant when properly installed by a professional. Due to the variety of installation options, ECR4Kids does not include hardware for installation. A qualified professional must evaluate the location and provide the appropriate hardware to ensure compliance and safe use. ECR4Kids takes pride in manufacturing high-quality products designed for extended use and optimal safety. As an added convenience, if you register your product you can receive a free accessory pack annually that includes replacement safety straps with screws, new warning labels, and safety instructions. This diaper changing table measures 35. 5? L × 4? W × 19? H when closed and 35. 5"" L × 19"" W × 19"" H when open. ECR4Kids is committed to enhancing education in the classroom and at home. We specialize in a wide range of high-quality educational furniture and supplies. We’re your partner for pre-K and beyond.
feature_bullets: EVERYDAY WALL-MOUNTED BABY CHANGING STATION: The ECR4Kids Wall-Mounted Baby Changing Station is designed for use with infants and toddlers (up to 3.5 years) in commercial restrooms.
OPTIMIZED FOR SAFETY: Our baby changing table features a smooth and comfortable concave surface and an adjustable child-safety strap to keep kids safely in place. The weight capacity is 250 lbs.
MODERN DESIGN: Our diaper-changing table has a space-saving design that features an antibacterial high-density polyethylene plastic for strength and durability in an attractive neutral-white color.
MULTIPLE CONVENIENT FEATURES: Our diaper changing board features 2 diaper bag hooks that hold up to 25 lbs. each to keep personal items off the floor and 2 built-in sanitary paper liner dispensers.
CERTIFIED AND COMPLIANT: This changing station is ADA, ANSI, and ASTM compliant when properly installed by a professional.
PROFESSIONAL INSTALLATION: A qualified professional must evaluate the location and provide the appropriate hardware to ensure compliance and safe use. Hardware not included for optimal safety.
DIMENSIONS: The overall dimensions of the ECR4Kids Wall-Mounted Baby Changing Station are 35.5″ L × 4″ W × 19″ H, and it weighs 20 lbs. when assembled.
MULTIPLE APPLICATIONS: Our Baby Changing Station has been designed to be used in public or private restrooms in restaurants, businesses, preschools, daycare, churches, or residential properties.
